Data classificationÂ \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The data classification below includes the categories that are relevant to these requirements and would typically be used in a development project. The Business Analyst is responsible for assigning the correct categories to the data dealt with by the solution. This is not something that the development teams should be deciding internally. Refer to the Data Protection Standard for a more detailed definition of personal data and sensitive personal data.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/003720df-1d17-4d97-b55f-3bc7b54ece9f/image2018-10-4_16-37-28.png\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":738,\"height\":197}},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\n\\n\\n\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
